Name: Days Gone By
About the game: Days Gone By tries to endevour a striking expierence getting back that simpleton feeling of the long gone scrolling genre. Providing a mesh up of levels where timing and awareness are essential for completing the game levels, it tries to strike every kind of Player. No respawn, no second chance, no power-ups, no buff and no maps to help you it's a one way journey to a tale told many times and never truly forgotten. A dozen of levels to face and beat and you will take on a magic king to arrival. AND NOW A FRACKING HUGE SWORD! Available on Windows PC, Macs, Linux based platforms and SteamOS machines. Purchasing the game gives you access no matter which the aforementioned system you are using. Buy the package and you can play wherever you are! Enjoy!
